customerReview-save.message: The review has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

review-delete.title: Delete review
review-delete.message: This action may result in a rating change. Are you sure you want to delete review?

permissions.backInStock:update: Approve, reject and reset review status

CustomerReviewEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when the order is completed and the customer does not leave any product feedback.

BackInStockEnabled.title: Product reviews enabled
BackInStockEnabled.description: When enabled, customers can provide feedback and reviews for products.

BackInStockEnabledForAnonymous.title: Allow anonymous to submit product reviews
BackInStockEnabledForAnonymous.description: Enabling this option allows non-registered users to share their opinions on products.

CanSubmitReviewWhenHasOrder.title: Only customer who bought product can create new review
CanSubmitReviewWhenHasOrder.description: This restriction ensures that reviews are authored by genuine buyers.

Calculation.Method.title: Rating calculation method
Calculation.Method.description: Defines the approach or algorithm employed to determine ratings based on specific criteria or parameters.

BackInStockEnabledRequestReviewJob.title: Auto Review Email Enabled
BackInStockEnabledRequestReviewJob.description: Enable job to send emails requesting a review to customer when order is in state after x days

BackInStockRequestReviewCronJob.title: Cron expression for processing job execution
BackInStockRequestReviewCronJob.description:
The value is a regular CRON expression.
To run task every X minutes please use "0/x * * * *".
To run it every X hours at 00 minutes use "0 */X * * *". You can also specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
To run it every X days at midnight use "0 0 */x * *"

BackInStockRequestReviewDaysInState.title: Order state at x days
BackInStockRequestReviewDaysInState.description: Specifies the duration in days after which an order transitions to a new state.

BackInStockRequestReviewOrderInState.title: Order state to send mails
BackInStockRequestReviewOrderInState.description: Defines the order state at which emails are automatically sent to customers.

BackInStockRequestReviewMaxRequests.title: Max e-mails sent to customer
BackInStockRequestReviewMaxRequests.description: Limits the maximum number of emails that can be sent to a customer within a specified timeframe.
